entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@MikeKellyPA @realDonaldTrump @POTUS Quite the point, Rep.
Trump DIDN'T show up.
Instead he sat in the White House & rage-tweeted expecting COVID-19 to magically disappear by April.
It didn't.
This PPE is 2 months late.
And the Obamagate ruse is lame & desperate. 
It reminds us of Trump's inadequacies.
#TrumpGate
